duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with potential clients who have requested services through the company's marketing program.
Achieve sales targets and quotas by presenting clients with suitable financial and insurance products.
Participate in company-provided training and coaching to enhance sales skills and product knowledge.
Build and maintain positive relationships with clients, providing guidance and support for their financial planning.
Identify and pursue opportunities for business growth and client acquisition.
Collaborate with team members and contribute to the overall success of the sales team.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
